questions.question: What is Airbar?
questions.answer: Airbar is a peer-to-peer crowdshipping platform that connects travelers with people who need packages delivered. Travelers can earn money from their unused luggage space, while senders save up to 70% compared to traditional courier services.

questions.question: How does Airbar work?
questions.answer: Senders post packages they need delivered, travelers list their trips, and our platform matches them. All payments are held in escrow until delivery is confirmed, and every delivery includes photo proof and real-time tracking.

questions.question: Is Airbar safe?
questions.answer: Yes! All travelers are KYC verified, payments are protected by escrow, deliveries require photo documentation at pickup and delivery, and we have a comprehensive dispute resolution process. Plus, all deliveries are covered by our protection policy.

questions.question: How much can I save with Airbar?
questions.answer: Senders typically save 50-70% compared to traditional courier services. The exact savings depend on the route, package size, and delivery timeframe.

questions.question: What can I send through Airbar?
questions.answer: You can send most personal items, documents, electronics, gifts, and non-perishable goods. Prohibited items include weapons, illegal substances, hazardous materials, and items restricted by airline regulations.

questions.question: How do I track my package?
questions.answer: You'll receive real-time updates throughout the journey, including pickup confirmation with photos, flight departure/arrival updates, and delivery confirmation with photos.

questions.question: How much can I earn?
questions.answer: Travelers typically earn $50-300 per trip depending on the route and how much luggage space they offer. International routes and business/first class travelers often earn more.

questions.question: What are my responsibilities as a traveler?
questions.answer: You need to: inspect packages before accepting them, take photos at pickup and delivery, keep packages secure during travel, and deliver within the agreed timeframe.

questions.question: When do I get paid?
questions.answer: Payment is released from escrow within 48 hours of delivery confirmation. You can withdraw funds instantly to your bank account or keep them in your Airbar wallet.

questions.question: How does payment work?
questions.answer: Senders pay upfront when a match is accepted. Funds are held securely in escrow and released to the traveler after successful delivery. This protects both parties.

questions.question: What fees does Airbar charge?
questions.answer: Airbar charges a 15% service fee on successful deliveries. This covers escrow protection, customer support, and platform operations. There are no listing fees or subscription costs.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

questions.question: How are travelers verified?
questions.answer: All travelers must complete KYC (Know Your Customer) verification including government ID verification, address proof, and background checks for certain routes.

questions.question: What if something goes wrong?
questions.answer: Our comprehensive dispute resolution process handles any issues. Most disputes are resolved within 48 hours. For lost or damaged items, our protection policy covers up to $1,000 per package.

questions.question: Are packages insured?
questions.answer: Basic protection up to $200 is included free. Additional coverage up to $1,000 can be purchased for 3% of the declared value.
